prompts: Create a colorful bird Pokemon that can mimic sounds and sings beautifully.
I want a flying-type Pokemon with a vibrant green body and a black crest.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a parrot, featuring blue and green feathers.
Make a small, cheerful Pokemon that loves to sing and dance around.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into urban environments while retaining bright colors.
Design a Pokemon with a distinct black and blue color scheme, perfect for a performance.
Show me a whimsical flying Pokemon that captures the essence of music and joy.
